beta.enableCSSDesc: Allows the plugin to inject custom CSS into the graph view for further customization. Write the name of the CSS snippet to use.
beta.revertActionDesc: If the max number of nodes is reached, try to reverse last action instead of disabling the plugin

errors.uri401: Unauthorized URL (Code 401) while trying to get an image for a node. This probably means that the URL is invalid. No image will be loaded and this message can safely be ignored.
errors.issueNeedView: There was an issue with the plugin $t(plugin.name). Please close the graph view and open it again.
errors.paletteNameRequired: You need to choose a name for this color map

features.startNodeDesc: Select the starting note for the path.
features.endNodeDesc: Select the ending note for the path.
features.animateDotsOnLinksDesc: Animate dots on links when a node is hovered to show the flow of information
features.animateDotsOnLinksSpeedDesc: Speed of the animation of the dots on links
features.arrowsColorDesc: Pick a custom color for the links arrows
features.arrowsInvertDesc: Invert the direction of the arrows on the links
features.arrowsFixedSizeDesc: Prevent the arrows to scale down or up when zooming
features.arrowsFlatDesc: Use triangle arrows instead of the default curved ones
features.arrowsOpaqueDesc: Remove any transparency from the arrow so they are fully opaque
features.arrowsScaleDesc: Increase or decrease the scale of arrows
features.autoEnableDesc: Auto enable the plugin in graph views
features.autoResetDesc: Reset the plugin in the graph views where it is enabled, if settings have changed after closing this tab
features.borderUnresolvedDesc: If between 0 and 1 (excluded), unresolved nodes will only show an outside circle border instead of a full disk
features.brightnessDesc: Multiply the brightness of tags, properties, and links by a factor depending on the theme. Need reloading of the graph if you swap themes while plugin is enabled.
features.canonicalizePropertiesWithDataviewDesc: By default, the Dataview plugin canonicalize the property names, converting everything to lowercase, removing dashes and underscore. If you want to use the non-canonicalized version of the properties, disabled this. Note that if you have two properties, with one being the canonicalized version of the second one (for example CaseSensitive and casesensitive), the canonicalized version will be discarded. This option only applied if you're using the Dataview plugin.
features.colorBasedOnDepthDesc: Color the nodes based on their depth relative to the main node in the local graph
features.depthPaletteDesc: Choose the color palette for the depth level coloring nodes
features.disableNodesDesc: When all arcs are disabled on the node, remove it from the graph
features.excludeSourceFoldersDesc: Exclude forward links with source inside some folders (i.e. links coming out one of these folders)
features.excludeTargetFoldersDesc: Exclude backward links with target inside some folders (i.e. links going in one of these folders)
features.externalLinksDesc: Add external URLs as attachment nodes in the graph view. Types for links toward those nodes are not supported.
features.externalLinksOpenModeDesc: When left clicking on an external URL's node, select the expected behavior to open the URL
features.externalLinksPropertiesDesc: Names of the properties that can be used to decide if an external URL node should redirect towards a specific note or to the web view when clicked
features.noExclusionFilter: No excluded filter is applied right now. Add one below.
features.withExclusionFilter: Files matching the following filters won't have back/forward links in the graph:
features.fadeInElementsDesc: Extended elements added to the graph view by the plugin are faded in instead of appearing suddenly
features.filtersDesc: Exclude files and folders from the graph based on regex patterns
features.focusDesc: Add ways to easily identify nodes in your graph
features.focusOpenNodesDesc: Add a border around nodes associated to an open tab
features.focusScaleDesc: The node corresponding to the currently active note will be scaled up by this factor. Set to 1 for no scaling.
features.focusSearchResultsDesc: Add a border around nodes that are part of a search result via the core Search plugin
features.folderShowFullPathDesc: If enable, the full path of the folder will be displayed ; if disabled, only the folder name will be displayed
features.iconsDesc: Use icons or emoji for nodes
features.iconBackgroundColor: Use icon color for the background
features.iconBackgroundColorDesc: Use the icon color instead of the default node color for the background. For emojis, the average color will be used.
features.iconBackgroundOpacityDesc: Set the opacity of the node itself behind the icon. Set to 0 for no background.
features.iconBorderWidthDesc: Add a border to the node around the icon of the specified width. Set to 0 for no border.
features.iconPropertiesDesc: Keys (names) of the properties that can be used to query the icon of the node's note. Supported values in the frontmatter can be either unicode emojis or Lucide icon identifiers.
features.iconUsePluginDesc: Use the icons set in the file explorer via "Iconic" or "Iconize" community plugins
features.iconUsePluginColorDesc: Use the color of the icons set in the file explorer via "Iconic" or "Iconize"
features.iconUseParentIcon: Use the icon of a parent folder
features.iconUseParentIconDesc: If no icon is set on the file itself with "Iconic" or "Iconize", it will try to find one set on a parent folder
features.imageDesc: Display image on top of nodes
features.imagesAllowExternalDesc: Allow the loading of external images via http: and https: protocols
features.imagesAllowExternalLocal: Allow local images outside of the vault
features.imagesAllowExternalLocalDesc: Allow the loading of external images via file: and app: protocols
features.imagesFromPropertyDesc: Display image from a property in the frontmatter
features.imagesFromEmbedsDesc: Display an image if one is found among the embeds in the note. The setting "From a property" has priority.
features.imagePropertiesDesc: Names of the properties that can be used to query the image of the node's note
features.imageBorderWidthDesc: Percentage of the node's background that will stay visible as a border
features.ignoreInlineLinksDesc: Links defined inside the note and outside of the frontmatter will not be added to the graph

interactives.arcsAddPropertyDesc: Add arcs around the nodes to visualize the property values
interactives.arcsAddTagDesc: Add arcs around the nodes to visualize the tags
interactives.arcsSpreadDesc: Spread the arcs around the nodes to fill the available space
interactives.arcWeightDesc: Use the number of time the value is found to determine arcs lengths (requires 'Spread arcs' to be enabled)
interactives.colorLinksDesc: Add colors to the link rendered in the graph view
interactives.colorLinkTypeLabelDesc: Color the type label (text) with the same color as the link
interactives.curvedFactorDesc: A negative value will inverse the shape, a greater absolute value will increase the curvature, while a value close to 0 will flatten it
interactives.curvedLinksDesc: Use curved links instead of straight lines
interactives.displayLinkTypeLabelDesc: Display the type label on top of the link
interactives.noneTypeIDDesc: The id which will be given if nothing is found for
interactives.paletteMatplotlibDesc: These colormaps come from matplotlib. You can see more about them here:
interactives.propertiesDesc: Display and filter by property values
interactives.propertyReservedFolders: This property key is reserved for folders
interactives.propertyReservedLinks: This property key is reserved for links
interactives.propertyReservedTags: This property key is reserved for tags
interactives.selectionDesc: Choose which values should be considered by the plugin
interactives.specificColorsDesc: Choose specific colors to override the color palette

features.layersDesc: Group nodes by layers and adjust their opacity
features.layersDisplayLabelsDesc: If a layer has a label associated, for example `4_cave`, add the label to the UI
features.layersInfoDataview: If you modify layers' levels and labels from this pane, Dataview inline properties will not be updated
features.layersInfoLevelNotFromID: Level of this layer is not based on the property value
features.layersNumberDesc: Set up the maximum number of active layers that will be shown in the graph view
features.layersOrderDesc: Choose if layers must be considered in an ascending or descending order
features.layerPropertiesDesc: Names of the properties that can be used to query the layer of the node's note
features.layersOpacityIfNoLayerDesc: If a node is not associated to a layer, it will use this opacity (set to 0 to hide)
features.layersUseCustomOpacityDesc: Set up fixed opacity values (0-1) for some layers. If they are shown, they will always be shown with this opacity, other opacities will be interpolated.
features.linksAllowMultipleTypesDesc: Allow the graph to draw multiple types of links between two nodes
features.linksOutlineDesc: Add a thin outline to the links and the arrows (when opaque)
features.linksSameColorAsNodeDesc: Use the color of the source node to color links
features.linksFeatureRequired: The Links feature needs to be enabled.
features.localGraphDesc: Customize your local graph with settings specific to this view
features.localGraphCurrentNodeColorDesc: Color of the main node of the local graph
features.localGraphCurrentNodeSizeDesc: Base size of the main node of the local graph. Default: 100, minimum: 10.
features.localGraphCurrentNodeShapeDesc: Shape of the main node of the local graph
features.pinMultipleGridSizeDesc: Values can be 'N' (single row), 'auto' (square grid) or a positive integer
features.elementsStatsDesc: Choose how nodes and links sizes/colors must be computed
features.linkSizesFunctionDesc: Select how the graph engine should compute the thickness of the links
features.linkColorsFunctionDesc: Select how the graph engine should compute the color of the links
features.linkColorsPaletteDesc: Choose the color palette for the links
features.namesDesc: Customize how nodes names are displayed
features.namesNumberOfCharactersDesc: Maximum number of characters to display for the node name. Leave empty to display the full name. Choose the character(s) that should be displayed if the name is truncated.
features.namesShowOnlyFileNameDesc: Show only the file name without the path
features.namesNoExtensionDesc: Remove the file extension from the name
features.namesUsePropertiesDesc: Use one of the desired properties as the node name instead of the filename
features.namesBackgroundDesc: Add a background to the node name in order to make it more readable by hiding elements behind it
features.namesShowWhenNeighborHighlighted: Always show when hovering neighbor node
features.namesShowWhenNeighborHighlightedDesc: Shows the text even when fully zoomed out if a connected neighbor node is highlighted
features.namesVerticalOffsetDesc: Vertical offset of the text. Positive value will push the text lower, and positive value will move it higher.
features.namesDynamicVerticalOffsetDesc: Dynamically adapt the vertical position of the text to avoid any overlapping with node's elements (arrows, arcs, shape)
features.noLineHighlightDesc: When hovering a node, don't highlight the connected links
features.nodeSizesFunctionDesc: Select how the graph engine should compute the size of the nodes
features.nodeSizePropertiesDesc: Names of the properties that can be used to specify the size of the node. They must be of type number. A value of 100 is the default.
features.nodeSizesRangeDesc: Minimum and maximum factors (between 0.1 and 5) that will be used to scale the sizes of the nodes
features.nodeColorsFunctionDesc: Select how the graph engine should compute the color of the nodes
features.nodeColorsPaletteDesc: Choose the color palette for the nodes
features.nodeStatsDirection: Graph direction to compute node statistics
features.nodeStatsDirectionDesc: When computing the node statistics, use the default directed graph, the reverse graph (source nodes become targets and vice versa), or the undirected graph (no effect for directed metrics such as backlinks)
features.nodeStatsRecomputeOnGraphChangeDesc: Recompute the metrics everytime the graph's data changes. This can create a drop in performances.
features.openInNewTabDesc: Always open the nodes in a new tab when left clicking on them
features.performanceDelayDesc: Because of asynchronous mechanics, it can be needed to wait a time before starting initializing the extended features
features.performanceMaxNodesDesc: If the graph contains more nodes than this setting, the plugin will be disabled
features.removeSourcesDesc: When disabling a link type, also disable the source nodes
features.removeTargetsDesc: When disabling a link type, also disable the source nodes
features.zoomScaleDesc: When zooming on a node, set the used scale

inputs.leftClickIncompatibility: Multiple inputs use the same modifier for the left click ; only one of them will work
inputs.pinHotkeyDesc: When doing a right click on a node while holding the specified key down, it will pin the node
inputs.radialMenuDesc: When doing a right click on a node while holding the specified key down, it will show a radial context menu with data from the extended graph plugin, rather than the usual context menu
inputs.rightClickIncompatibility: Multiple inputs use the same modifier for the right click ; only one of them will work
inputs.selectHotkeyDesc: When doing a left click on a node while holding the specified key down, it will select the node

notices.changeInSettings: You can change this in the settings
notices.graphAnalysisPluginRequired: Graph Analysis community plugin must be enabled to use this function
notices.nlpPluginRequired: NLP community plugin must be enabled to use this function
notices.nodeLimiteExceeded: Try to handle too many nodes
notices.nodeStatSizeFailed: Failed to compute the statistics for the nodes sizes
notices.nodeStatColorFailed: Failed to compute the statistics for the nodes colors
notices.linkStatSizeFailed: Failed to compute the statistics for the links thickness
notices.linkStatColorFailed: Failed to compute the statistics for the links colors
notices.functionToDefault: The default function has been set instead.
notices.normalStateSave: Engine options have been saved for the normal state

query.ANDFilterDesc: Keep nodes with all selected values
query.ORFilterDesc: Keep nodes with at least one of the selected values
query.excludeRegexDesc: Use regex to automatically exclude some values. Start a new line for a new regex.

states.saveConfigsWithStateDesc: When saving a state, the plugin will automatically saves the config under the same name (cleaned from invalid characters)
states.saveForDefaultStateDesc: Save the current settings as the default state settings
states.saveForNormalStateTooltip: Save the current settings as the native graph settings
states.startingStateDesc: Select which state should be used to initiate the plugin
states.syncDefaultStateDesc: Always open the default state with the current options used by the core plugin without the need to manually save them

statsFunctions.warningUnreliableOS: This calculation is unreliable and might vary between OS.

UI.horizontalLegendDesc: Use a horizontal layout for the legend container (with tags, properties and tags toggle buttons)
UI.howToUseGradientMaker:
• Drag handles to move color stops along the gradient
  • Click a handle to change its color
  • Double-click on the gradient to add a new color stop
  • Backspace, Delete or Clear keys on a handle to remove it
  • Interpolate: creates smooth color transitions between stops
  • Reverse: flips the final palette order (left ↔ right)
UI.name: Name
UI.showPinIconDesc: When a node is pinned, show an icon in its top right corner to mark its pinned state
